title: Thikana - Smart Building Management System
description: Thikana is a smart building management web app that enables users, members, and admins to manage apartments, rent, payments, coupons, and announcements through secure role-based dashboards.
features: Role-Based Dashboard & Access Control for User, Member, and Admin
Apartment listing with search, filter, and pagination

title: FoodKing - Food Sharing Web Application
description: FoodKing is a food sharing web application that allows users to share surplus food with others, helping reduce food waste and support the community.
features: Users can easily add their food items to the website and update or remove them anytime
Users can ask for food items shared by others whenever they need
Everyone logs in with their own account to keep their information and food items private and safe.
TanStack Query for data fetching & mutation

title: Green Plants - Plant Care Tracker
description: Green Plants is a user-friendly plant management web app that helps users track, update, and manage houseplants along with their care schedules.
features: Add, update, and delete plants with care schedules.
Dashboard showing an overview and care statistics.
Secure user login for personalized plant management.
